00057 {
00058   //Clear the base classes and then clear/delete any local
00059   //members. Its necessary for this Clear method to exist
00060   //in the case that instances of this object are stored

00064         KMuonVetoSystemRecord::Clear(opt);

00081 Bool_t KHLAMuonVetoSysRecord::IsSame(const KHLAMuonVetoSysRecord &aRec, Bool_t bPrint) const
00082 {
00083         //Compares two objects and their member variables to test for equality.
00084         //If bPrint is set to true, then a message for each member variable that is different
00085         //will print to standard out. Otherwise, this method will return false and quit
00086         //checking member variables as soon as it finds a unequal data member.
00087         
00088         Bool_t bIsEqual = true; //assume its true, then test for differences
00089         
00090         //call the base class's IsSame methods
00091         if(!this->KMuonVetoSystemRecord::IsSame(aRec,bPrint)){
00092                 bIsEqual = false;
00093                 if(!bPrint)
00094                         return false;  //if we're not printing out, just return false at first failure
00095                 //the operator== method uses this functionality.
00096         }
00097 
00098         
00099         return bIsEqual;
00100 
00101 }
